summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4299 for the improvement of Jones Avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 70th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51035, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
